subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: Coach Bill Belichick would not discuss the officials’ decision to wave off a penalty on the final play of the Patriots’ 24-20 loss to the Panthers on Monday, but players and fans were not as quiet.
snippet: Coach Bill Belichick would not discuss the officials’ decision to wave off a penalty on the final play of the Patriots’ 24-20 loss to the Panthers on Monday, but players and fans were not as quiet.
